name: CreateOrganizationUnitSet
description:
Creates a new `OrganizationUnitSet`.

  Optionally a definition can be provided, which defines a set of filters.
  Any `OrganizationUnit` that matches the filters are automatically part of the set.

  If a definition is provided without any filters, it's ignored.

  The ScopeID refers to an `OrganizationUnitSetScope` and can be used to create collections of sets for specific purposes, such as discounts.
auth_description: Requires a user of type `Employee` or `Api` with functionality `OrganizationUnitSets:Create`

headers.name: EVA-User-Agent
headers.description: The user agent that is making these calls. Don't make this specific per device/browser but per application. This should be of the form: `MyFirstUserAgent/1.0.0`

headers.name: EVA-Requested-OrganizationUnitID
headers.description: The ID of the organization unit to run this request in.

headers.name: EVA-Requested-OrganizationUnit-Query
headers.description: The query that selects the organization unit to run this request in.

headers.name: EVA-IDs-Mode
headers.description: The IDs mode to run this request in. Currently only `ExternalIDs` is supported.

request_samples.name: CURL

C.name: IsEmpty

**Will be removed in 750**
C.description:
Read-only property that indicates if the CountryFilter, LanguageFilter and TypeFilter are empty (null).

**Deprecated since 742:** IsEmpty is deprecated and will be removed in 2.0.758: This property is now exposed as a settable property, which isn't the case.Will be removed for clarity.

**Will be removed in 750**

C.name: TypeFilter
C.description:
Flags enum, combine any of the below values:

* `0` - None
* `1` - Shop
* `2` - WebShop
* `4` - Container
* `8` - Pickup
* `16` - Warehouse
* `36` - Country
* `64` - Franchise
* `128` - EVA
* `256` - TestOrganizationUnit
* `512` - DisableLogin
* `1024` - Supplier
* `1024` - ExternalSupplier
* `3072` - Consignment
* `4096` - B2b
* `8196` - Region
* `16384` - ReturnsPortal
* `32768` - Restitution
* `65536` - RepairCenter

E.name: ID
E.description: This is the ID of a `OrganizationUnitSet`

B.name: Name
B.description: Name is only optional when creating an AdHoc set.

B.name: ScopeID
B.description: This is the ID of a `OrganizationUnitSetScope`

B.name: Subsets
B.description: When specified, adds the sets contained in Subsets as a subset of the new set.

G.name: Code
G.description: A unique ID identifying this error.

G.name: Message
G.description: A human-readable message describing the error.

G.name: RequestID
G.description: A unique ID identifying the request. Please provide this ID when contacting support.

G.name: Type
G.description: A short description of the error type.

H.name: ExternalIDs
H.description: When using the `ExternalIDs` mode, this will hold the resolved external IDs.

H.name: IsAsyncResultAvailable
H.description: This is a flag indicating whether the async request is done. If it is `null`, it is not an async service. If it is `false`, the response is not yet available. Do not process the properties in that case. It is is `true` the properties are filled with the result of the call.

H.name: UnresolvedExternalIDs
H.description: When using the `ExternalIDs` mode, this will hold the external IDs we couldn't resolve.
